page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN CURY/GUNWALLOE
page.content: The majority of the people who live in the area are basically in three major categories of employment. The major employment being farming with approximetely forty percent of the local population.Then service personel and civilians who work at the Royal Naval Air Station at Culdrose with approximately twenty percent.Ten to twenty percent are employed in various occupations in Mullion,Helston and other areas.The remainder are either retired in the area or retired to the area or are unemployed. A few people are employed in the area,the post office,the two shops,the Primary School in Cury i.e. teaching and catering staff,etc., and a small blockworks.But these are relatively few in the employment categories.
